Dialogue Text: Hey, are you a frequent visitor of this place?
While I was passing by on my way earlier, something caught my attention!
I was thinking if you could guide me there.
Why do you want to go there?
No matter where I looked, it was just water everywhere...
But all of a sudden, I saw these flashes of light before my eyes!
I was intrigued by the way the lights were moving from a distance!
Even though it is just a single structure, it illuminated most of the paths around it.
I suppose the flashes of light piqued your interest.
Yeah! Always rotating its direction. I thought it was pretty cool.
Well, most of the lights here come from the houses surrounding it so when I finally saw something moved, I thought, I really had to find its source!
Do you remember seeing any paths nearby?
I can see why you're intrigued
Hm, based on how far I could see, I suppose there was a really pretty house with a dome nearby.
Indeed! It reminded me of the way one single person could become a pillar of support for others. Just like this structure!
